Reviews.Title: Perfect Product
Reviews.Author: A. Tweedle "Tweety-Bird"
Reviews.Content: Nokia phones work great. Very easy to use and made of great quality. The Tracfone service is especially wonderful. It offers awesome nationwide coverage and incredible savings each month which can really add up. Making the switch to this service was one of the best decisions I have made and I definitely reccommend giving it a try :) You won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Great cell phone!
Reviews.Author: Steven Novakovich
Reviews.Content: Simple, fully-functional, 2G GSM cell phone. One of the very best for how cheap it is. Perfect size, too.If you are in the market for a cheap cell phone with *excellent* sound quality as well as text messaging capabilities, this is perfect!
